Package com.gsm.service

Interface PurchaseOrderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PurchaseOrderServiceImpl
    public interface PurchaseOrderService
    Service layer interface for managing Purchase Order business logic. Defines the contract for all PO operations, including state transitions like approval and rejection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void approve​(java.lang.Long id)
      Approves a Purchase Order, changing its status to 'Approved'.
      void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
      Deletes one or more Purchase Orders based on a list of IDs.
      java.util.List<PurchaseOrderDto> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all Purchase Orders, optimized for list view.
      PurchaseOrderDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Finds a single Purchase Order by its ID, with full details.
      java.util.List<PurchaseOrderDto> findPendingApproval()
      Finds all Purchase Orders that are currently awaiting approval (status is 'Submitted').
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> generatePOsFromOrderBOM​(OrderBOMDto bomDto)
      Generates new Purchase Orders based on the details of a saved Order BOM.

      • findAll

        java.util.List<PurchaseOrderDto> findAll()
        Retrieves a list of all Purchase Orders, optimized for list view.
        Returns:
        A list of PurchaseOrderDto objects.

      • findById

        PurchaseOrderDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a single Purchase Order by its ID, with full details.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the PO to find.
        Returns:
        The detailed PurchaseOrderDto.

      • save

        PurchaseOrderDto save​(PurchaseOrderDto dto)
        Saves a new PO or updates an existing one based on the provided DTO. This is the primary method for persisting PO data from the UI.
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO containing the PO data.
        Returns:
        The saved PurchaseOrderDto.

      • deleteByIds

        void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
        Deletes one or more Purchase Orders based on a list of IDs. REFACTORED: Changed from deleteById to handle bulk deletion consistently.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of PO IDs to be deleted.

      • submitForApproval

        void submitForApproval​(java.lang.Long id)
        Submits a Purchase Order for approval, changing its status from 'New' to 'Submitted'.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the PO to submit.

      • findPendingApproval

        java.util.List<PurchaseOrderDto> findPendingApproval()
        Finds all Purchase Orders that are currently awaiting approval (status is 'Submitted').
        Returns:
        A list of pending PurchaseOrderDtos.

      • approve

        void approve​(java.lang.Long id)
        Approves a Purchase Order, changing its status to 'Approved'.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the PO to approve.

      • reject

        void reject​(java.lang.Long id)
        Rejects a Purchase Order, changing its status to 'Rejected'.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the PO to reject.
